name: Secret Party
description:
Louis wants to have a home party with friends but his parents don't allow him because they want to be disturb. Louis looks for ways to get the party going. Then, he starts collecting secure party stuffs belong to his parents!

Let's help him to find party's stuff !!

CONTROLLER :
- A D W = MOVING
- SPACEBAR = USE BOXES
- E  =  INTERACTIVE

#gamejamfromhome #gamejamfromhome2020
